title: Spring
description: Welcome to Evermore Academy where the magic is dark, the immortals are beautiful, and being human sucks.My name is Summer Solstice and this is going to be my year.Except, in the Everwilde, nothing ever goes according to plan. Students from the rival Fae academy join Evermore, and the Spring Court heir decides it’s his mission to make my life hell.In an effort to bend me to his will, the Spring Court heir takes someone I love. There’s only one way to save them, but it jeopardizes my entire future.Worse, someone steals the Darken’s soulstone. Everyone at the academy is a suspect.Forces are gathering.Sides are being chosen.To stand any chance of saving humanity, I must finally accept the soulbond with the Winter Prince.
author: Audrey  Grey
